name: Sharp Arrowhead
desc: A well-made arrowhead. Sharp enough to penetrate armor with the ease of a rock through the surface of water.

customize.name: Hilichurl Shooter
customize.desc:
The primitive wandering inhabitants of Teyvat's wildernesses.
Hilichurl archers who wield simple crossbows. Hilichurls do not, in truth, possess the craftsmanship needed to build crossbows. As such, it is commonly believed that there is an organization that controls the hilichurls from behind the scenes and furnishes them with equipment and material supplies. The Abyss Mages that often accompany these hilichurls are especially suspicious.

customize.name: Pyro Hilichurl Shooter
customize.desc:
The primitive wandering inhabitants of Teyvat's wildernesses.
These archers wield simple crossbows, and their arrowheads are coated with a thin layer of flammable material that can set their targets on fire. El Musk of the previous generation believed that this is an innovation by brighter hilichurls who wished to cook their game after hunting it.

customize.name: Electro Hilichurl Shooter
customize.desc:
The primitive wandering inhabitants of Teyvat's wildernesses.
These archers wield simple crossbows, and their arrowheads are crafted from carved Electro Crystals that will deliver an electric shock upon impact. They say that hilichurl archers of exceptional skill can fire five crossbow bolts at once — a most impressive feat indeed.

customize.name: Cryo Hilichurl Shooter
customize.desc:
The primitive wandering inhabitants of Teyvat's wildernesses.
These archers wield simple crossbows, and unmelting ice shrouds their arrowheads. It is said that wounds caused by these arrowheads heal very slowly, as the cold will slow the circulation of blood.

customize.name: Sharp Arrowhead
customize.desc: A well-made arrowhead. Sharp enough to penetrate armor with the ease of a rock through the surface of water.

customize.name: Masterless Stardust
customize.desc:
Currency used to purchase rare resources from the Shop.
Surplus Stardust of destiny. Perhaps it can create new destinies when in large enough quantities.

customize.name: Sharp Arrowhead
customize.desc: A well-made arrowhead. Sharp enough to penetrate armor with the ease of a rock through the surface of water.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Firm Arrowhead
customize.desc: A roughly produced arrowhead. Though unimpressive, neither it nor the bow should be underestimated, for even the bravest knight can be felled by an arrow from the rear.

customize.name: Traveler (Geo)
customize.desc: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

customize.name: Collei
customize.desc: A trainee ranger active in Avidya Forest. Behind her enthusiastic words and actions hides a slightly introverted personality.

customize.name: Diona
customize.desc: A young lady who has inherited trace amounts of non-human blood. She is the incredibly popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern.

customize.name: Fischl
customize.desc: A mysterious girl who calls herself "Prinzessin der Verurteilung" and travels with a night raven named Oz.

customize.name: Amber
customize.desc: Always energetic and full of life, Amber's the best — albeit only — Outrider of the Knights of Favonius.

customize.name: Thundering Pulse
customize.desc: A longbow that was a gift from the Shogun. Eternal lightning crackles all around it.

customize.name: Skyward Harp
customize.desc: A greatbow that symbolizes Dvalin's affiliation with the Anemo Archon. The sound of the bow firing is music to the Anemo Archon's ears. It contains the power of the sky and wind within.

customize.name: Song of Stillness
customize.desc: A strange longbow that resembles a sea creature. Its string makes no sound at all.

customize.name: King's Squire
customize.desc: It has taken on the shape of a bow that can shoot the enemies of the forest down.

customize.name: Predator
customize.desc: A uniquely-designed bow. This should not belong in this world.

customize.name: Hamayumi
customize.desc: A certain shrine maiden once owned this warbow. It was made with surpassing skill, and is both intricate and sturdy.

customize.name: The Viridescent Hunt
customize.desc: A pure green hunting bow. This once belonged to a certain hunter whose home was the forest.

customize.name: The Stringless
customize.desc: A bow that once served as an extraordinary instrument. It is no longer capable of getting people up and dancing.

customize.name: Raven Bow
customize.desc: Ravens are known to be the ferrymen of the dead. This bow's limb is decorated with raven feathers, which forebode the imminent death of its target.

customize.name: Skyward Atlas
customize.desc: A cloud atlas symbolizing Dvalin and his former master, the Anemo Archon. It details the winds and clouds of the northern regions and contains the powers of the sky and wind.

customize.name: Prototype Amber
customize.desc: A dully gilded catalyst secretly guarded in the Blackcliff Forge. It seems to glow with the very light from the sky.

customize.name: Lithic Spear
customize.desc: A spear forged from the rocks of the Guyun Stone Forest. Its hardness knows no equal.

customize.name: Black Tassel
customize.desc: An exceptionally powerful polearm that also offers a simple but elegant solution to the issue of the easily stained white tassel.

customize.name: Lithic Blade
customize.desc: A greatsword carved and chiseled from the very bedrock of Liyue.

customize.name: Sacrificial Greatsword
customize.desc: A ceremonial greatsword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

customize.name: Bloodtainted Greatsword
customize.desc: A steel sword that is said to have been coated with dragon blood, rendering it invulnerable to damage. This effect is not extended to its wielder, however.

customize.name: Aquila Favonia
customize.desc: The soul of the Knights of Favonius. Millennia later, it still calls on the winds of swift justice to vanquish all evil — just like the last heroine who wielded it.

customize.name: Blackcliff Longsword
customize.desc: A sword made of a material known as "blackcliff." It has a dark crimson glow on its black blade.

customize.name: Favonius Sword
customize.desc: A standard-issue longsword of the Knights of Favonius. When you're armed with this agile and sharp weapon, channeling the power of the elements has never been so easy!

customize.name: Cool Steel
customize.desc: A reliable steel-forged weapon that serves as a testament to the great adventures of its old master.

customize.name: Silver Sword
customize.desc: A sword for exorcising demons. Everyone knows it's made of a silver alloy, not pure silver.

customize.name: Dull Blade
customize.desc: Youthful dreams and the thrill of adventure. If this isn't enough, then make it up with valiance.

customize.name: Weathered Arrowhead
customize.desc:
An old arrowhead coated in blood. The arrowhead has long since lost its sharpness and thus its use as a weapon.
However, it represents the pride of a hunter and acts as both an amulet and a medal.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Sharp Arrowhead
customize.desc: A well-made arrowhead. Sharp enough to penetrate armor with the ease of a rock through the surface of water.

customize.name: Firm Arrowhead
customize.desc: A roughly produced arrowhead. Though unimpressive, neither it nor the bow should be underestimated, for even the bravest knight can be felled by an arrow from the rear.

customize.name: Weathered Arrowhead
customize.desc:
An old arrowhead coated in blood. The arrowhead has long since lost its sharpness and thus its use as a weapon.
However, it represents the pride of a hunter and acts as both an amulet and a medal.

value.text:
Crafted
Dropped by Lv. 40+ Hilichurl Shooters
Stardust Exchange
